parameters.name: Comment
parameters.description: The remarks of the authorization rule. The remarks can be up to 500 characters in length.

parameters.name: Databases
parameters.description: The information about the database that runs on your server.

parameters.name: EffectiveEndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the validity period of the authorization rule. Specify a UNIX timestamp representing the number of seconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

parameters.name: EffectiveStartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the validity period of the authorization rule. Specify a UNIX timestamp representing the number of seconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

parameters.name: HostGroups
parameters.description: The information about the asset group that you want to authorize to manage.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The bastion host ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the bastion host ID.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host.

> For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: The name of the authorization rule. The name can be up to 128 characters in length.

parameters.name: UserGroupIds
parameters.description: An array that consists of user group IDs.

parameters.name: UserIds
parameters.description: An array that consists of user IDs.
